programme.title: My Ryder Cup: David Howell

programme.title: My Ryder Cup: David Gilford
programme.desc: My Ryder Cup - David Gilford. David Gilford won the English Amateur in 1984, turned professional in 1986, claimed 6 European Tour titles and shone in the Ryder Cups of 1991 and 1995 scoring an impressive 3 out of 4 points.

programme.title: My Ryder Cup: Constantino Rocca
programme.desc: My Ryder Cup - Constantino Rocca. Italys first Ryder Cup player, Constantino Rocca made history with a 1995 hole-in-one and a 1997 win over Tiger Woods, leaving a lasting mark on European golf.
